titles: A list of the poll of the several companies of London for a lord mayor for the year ensuing: as it was cast up in the Irish Chamber of the Guild-Hall by the citizens appointed on each side for the scrutiny, in the presence of the Honourable Dudley North, Esq.; : one of the sheriffs of London and Middlesex, on Wednesday the 11. of this instant October, and then adjourned to Tuesday following: and in the meantime the inspectors to examine the books.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
keywords: Mayors --  England --  London --  Election --  Early works to 1800.
Guilds --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
